text: As usual the quality is sturdy yet elegant and the style is exquisite! The small hand fan matched the description perfectly. I'm fully satisfied and will now be able to cool myself easily in the office and on the train whilst looking very smart.

I bought this fan to bring to tango and swing dance events, and it is gorgeous! After a shipping snag outside of their control, Karmele provided fantastic communication and customer service to make sure the fan was delivered safe and sound. It was worth the wait!
LOVELY!  I think this is my 4th fan? Compliments, always‚ù§Ô∏è

This is the most beautiful and exciting fan I have ever bought. Everybody ask me where I got it! It‚Äôs strong, of excellent quality and with the exact same wax fabric used for a dress I bought in west Africa last year. I will regularly be buying from Olele going forward.

I wanted a small fan with a plain fabric for semi-formal events like weddings or funerals. This fan was beautifully made and packaged very well. The size is perfect for slipping into a small handbag or clutch. Very happy with my purchase.

I was looking for the perfect fan for a man like me. Then I found Karmeles shop and this wonderfully beautiful accessory. And I was thrilled with him in a split of a second. Blue is my favorite color and the pattern immediately made me think of a night sky shining with thousands of stars. Bingo! Hit! It had to be! Karmele made the fan very clean and simply perfect. He is delivered in a very nice and fine dark blue leather pocket. So now I can keep him safely at all times. An absolutely perfect combination, in my opinion. I can't wait to use him on a sunny spring day. We had it yesterday, but with 5 degrees and cool wind... I am absolutely certain, that we will have warmer temperatures very soon. Now I wish Karmele continued success and that she and all her loved ones stay healthy. Kind regards, Friedrich
The most beautiful fans! Thank you.

Karmele had this fan in dark wood, which I ordered and she sent out next day.  AS ALWAYS: FABULOUS!!!!  I now have and use a number of Karmele's fans.  I far prefer them to the French fans I own - each of Karmele's fans is unique.  Her wonderful fabrics can be combined with different colored wooden staves, as you choose.  She has made up several fans for me that were not posted and will show you what it will look like before making it up.  MANY thanks, once again, Karmele.

Karmele makes the most wondrous fans I've ever seen.  The fabrics; woods; combinations of the two are all unique and very sophisticated.  This time, I ordered a smaller fan for a petite friend as well as another one for me to use, myself - I'm often overheated.  So Karmele's fans are a gift to everyone who gets to see them in use - and everyone else loves them, too.
Many thanks, Karmele - I will order again.
P.S. These fans arrive - in their own beautiful cases - FAST!
My fan arrived earlier than expected and is absolutely gorgeous!  It came in time for me to use at an outdoor theatre production and got rave reviews from my girl friends.  So worth it!

This fan is made from a Japanese fabric - unlike the other two fans I ordered at the same time - and I love it that Karmele has provided the information to know what the pattern signifies.  The fabric is quite compelling to my eye in both colorways offered; I bought the brighter colors simply for summer use.  The way the fabrics are matched with their wooden staves and leather sleeves is extraordinary - Karmele's fans are truly incomparable.  I feel that I am carrying a small work of art with me when using one of Karmele's fans - others, on seeing them, agree.  MANY thanks, Karmele, for the beauty and comfort you have added to my days.

Karmele very kindly made up for me a fan from an earlier pattern: showing me how it would look in advance.  It - like the other 2 fans I purchased - is simply gorgeous.  And her fans are very sturdy, unlike some others I've used and worn out; these fans are of the highest quality.  And unique patterns.  Plus the wonderful leather sleeves make them easy to carry.  I am a fan (ha ha.)  I really will be buying more from this shop and couldn't recommend it more highly.  Besides everything else, Karmele answers inquiries quite promptly and makes one's order up rapidly: your fans are in your hands before you know it!  Thank you again, Karmele.

What a beautiful fan!  Fantastic fabric and staves; exceptionally well made!  This fan is a pleasure to use and receives comments whenever I am using it.  Karmele's fans are by far the best I have ever carried.  The fabric was somewhat differently placed on my fan in this pattern but is equally gorgeous.  And Karmele very kindly sent me a picture of how my fan would look before making it up for me.  I purchased three fans this time and will be back.  Many thanks, Karmele.  Oh - and did I say? - each fan came with its' own custom leather sleeve, and arrived remarkably quickly.
a wonderful gift for a fellow fan lover. she was thrilled. the craftsmanship is superb.
